template.name: A_IdentifierSynonym_Object
template.title: Identifier or synonym --> Database object.
template.longDescription: Find an entry in the database using any identifier or synonym.
template.comment: This is the template that the quick search runs. If the name is changed it also has to be changed for the quick search configuration - Rachel. Removed tags so no longer displayed - just used for quick search now. Rachel.

template.name: All_Genes_In_Organism_To_Publications
template.title: All genes in organism --> Publications.
template.longDescription: Show the publications for each gene in one organism. References are loaded from FlyBase for all Drosophila species, and from NCBI for D. melanogaster, C. elegans and S. cerevisiae.

query.name: All_Genes_In_Organism_To_Publications
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.publications.pubMedId Gene.publications.firstAuthor Gene.publications.journal Gene.publications.year Gene.organism.name

template.name: AlleleClass_Allele
template.title: Allele class --> Alleles [D. melanogaster].
template.longDescription: Find all D. melanogaster gene alleles from a certain allele type. List the corresponding genes. (Data Source: FlyBase).

template.name: AllGene_Chromosome
template.title: All genes in organism --> All chromosomal locations.
template.longDescription: Show the chromosomal location and sequence for all genes from a particular organism.

query.name: AllGene_Chromosome
query.view: Gene.chromosome.primaryIdentifier Gene.chromosomeLocation.strand Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.length Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol

constraint.description: Show the chromosome location and gene sequences for all genes from organism:

template.name: allGO_GeneOrganism_1
template.title: GO term name/id [and children of this term] --> Genes in one specific organism.
template.longDescription: Find all genes that are associated with a particular GO term in a specific organism. This template will return genes that have been assigned the given GO term as well as genes that have a more specific GO term.

query.name: allGO_GeneOrganism_1
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.allGoAnnotation.identifier Gene.allGoAnnotation.name Gene.allGoAnnotation.actualGoTerms.identifier Gene.allGoAnnotation.actualGoTerms.name Gene.allGoAnnotation.qualifier Gene.allGoAnnotation.goEvidenceCodes.code Gene.allGoAnnotation.property.namespace

constraint.description: Search for genes in:
that have the following GO term:

template.name: Amplicon_RNAiResults
template.title: Amplicon [D. melanogaster] --> RNAi screen results.
template.longDescription: Find all RNAi screen results from the DRSC for a particular amplicon. Result types can be: not screened, not a hit, weak, medium or strong hit. (Data Source: DRSC).

template.name: AmpliconHit_RNAiResults
template.title: Amplicon [D. melanogaster] + Result type --> RNAi screen results.
template.longDescription: List all DRSC RNAi screens where a specific amplicon has been found to be a certain type of result. Result types can be: not screened, not a hit, weak, medium or strong hit.

constraint.description: List all screens where the following amplicon
has been found to be the following type of result:

template.name: AmpliconScreen_RNAiResults
template.title: Amplicon [D. melanogaster] + RNAi screen --> RNAi screen results.
template.longDescription: Find all screen results for a specific amplicon from a specific DRSC RNAi screen. Result types can be: not screened, not a hit, weak, medium or strong hit. (Data Source: DRSC).

constraint.description: Show all results for the following amplicon
from the RNAi screen published in this paper:

template.name: AnatomyTerm_Alleles
template.title: Phenotype [D. melanogaster] --> Alleles.
template.longDescription: Find all D. melanogaster alleles that have a phenotype in a specific anatomical structure and that are from a certain allele class. (Data Source: FlyBase)

query.name: AnatomyTerm_Alleles
query.view: Gene.alleles.annotations.anatomyTerm.name Gene.alleles.annotations.anatomyTerm.identifier Gene.alleles.primaryIdentifier Gene.alleles.secondaryIdentifier Gene.alleles.alleleClass Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol

constraint.description: Find all alleles that have a phenotype in the following body part:
and that are from the following allele class:

template.name: AnatomyTerm_Region_new
template.title: Anatomy term [D. melanogaster] --> CRMs.

query.view: CRM.anatomyOntology.name CRM.primaryIdentifier CRM.chromosome.primaryIdentifier CRM.chromosomeLocation.start CRM.chromosomeLocation.end CRM.length CRM.publications.pubMedId CRM.gene.regulatoryRegions.dataSets.dataSource.name

template.longDescription: For a specific ImaGo term, show all the D. melanogaster genes that are associated with it, according to the BDGP in situ project. (Data Source: BDGP).

template.longDescription: Show microarray tiling path amplimers and the primers used to create them that are located between two points on a chromosome.

query.view: PCRProduct.chromosome.primaryIdentifier PCRProduct.primaryIdentifier PCRProduct.length PCRProduct.primers.primaryIdentifier PCRProduct.primers.sequence.residues PCRProduct.primers.chromosomeLocation.start PCRProduct.primers.chromosomeLocation.end PCRProduct.subjects.subject.primaryIdentifier PCRProduct.subjects.subject.sequence.residues PCRProduct.subjects.subject.chromosomeLocation.start PCRProduct.subjects.subject.chromosomeLocation.end

template.name: ChromLocation_AmplimerPrimerPromoter

query.view: PCRProduct.chromosome.primaryIdentifier PCRProduct.primaryIdentifier PCRProduct.length PCRProduct.primers.primaryIdentifier PCRProduct.primers.sequence.residues PCRProduct.primers.chromosomeLocation.start PCRProduct.primers.chromosomeLocation.end PCRProduct.subjects.subject.primaryIdentifier PCRProduct.subjects.subject.sequence.residues PCRProduct.subjects.subject.chromosomeLocation.start PCRProduct.subjects.subject.chromosomeLocation.end

template.longDescription: For a specific D. melanogaster protein, show its 3-D structure and the experimental method used to determine it. (Data Source: PDB).

query.name: Protein_PDBStructure
query.view: Protein.primaryIdentifier Protein.name Protein.structures.identifier Protein.structures.title Protein.structures.technique Protein.structures.resolution Protein.structures.dataSets.dataSource.name

template.name: Protein_ProteinInteractionDmRNAi
template.title: Protein [D. melanogaster] --> Interacting proteins with hits in RNAi screens.
template.longDescription: For a particular D. melanogaster protein, find the genes that it physically interacts with that have been shown to interact that have a hit in an RNAi screen at the DRSC. (Data Source: IntAct, DRSC).
template.comment: updated Adrian 16.9.08

query.name: Protein_ProteinInteractionDmRNAi
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

template.name: Protein_Structure
template.title: Protein --> Regions with predicted 3-D structure.
template.longDescription: For the following protein, show all regions for which there is a predicted 3D structure. Data available for D. melanogaster or A. gambiae.

query.name: Protein_Structure
query.view: Protein.primaryAccession Protein.name Protein.organism.name Protein.structures.start Protein.structures.end Protein.structures.identifier

template.name: ProteinDomain_Protein
template.title: Protein + Domains --> Proteins.
template.longDescription: For a particular protein show whether it contains a particular domain. (Data Source: UniProt).

constraint.description: For the following protein(s):
Show whether it contains protein domain(s):

template.name: ProteinInteraction_OrthologueOrganism_new
template.title: All pairs of interacting proteins in organism1 --> Orthologues in organism2.
template.longDescription: For all pairs of interacting proteins in a particular organism, show the corresponding pairs of genes and the orthologues of these genes in another organism.
template.comment: updated 16.9.08 by Adrian. Do not precompute - rns

query.name: ProteinInteraction_OrthologueOrganism_new
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

constraint.description: For the following organism, for all pairs of interacting proteins, show the corresponding pair of genes.
For the following organism, show the orthogue for each of the pair of interacting genes found in organism 1.

template.name: Publication_Genes
template.title: Publication --> Genes.
template.longDescription: Show all genes that were mentioned in a specific publication. References are loaded from FlyBase for all Drosophila species, and from NCBI for D. melanogaster, C. elegans and S. cerevisiae.

query.name: Publication_Genes
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.publications.pubMedId Gene.publications.title Gene.publications.firstAuthor Gene.publications.year

template.name: Publication_Interactions
template.title: Publication [D. melanogaster] --> Interactions.
template.longDescription: Show all interactions from a particular publication. (Note: you need to enter a pubmed id). Data available for D. melanogaster, C. elegans and S. cerevisiae. (Data Source: BioGRID, IntAct).

query.name: Publication_Interactions
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.interactions.role Gene.interactions.interactingGenes.primaryIdentifier Gene.interactions.interactingGenes.symbol Gene.interactions.name Gene.interactions.type.name Gene.interactions.confidenceText Gene.interactions.experiment.publication.firstAuthor Gene.interactions.experiment.publication.year Gene.interactions.dataSets.title

constraint.description: Show interactions from publication:

template.name: Publication_RNAi
template.title: Publication [D. melanogaster] --> RNAi screen results.
template.longDescription: Show all the results from a D. melanogaster RNAi screen published in a particular publication. (Data Source: DRSC).

constraint.description: Show all results from the RNAi screen published in this paper:

template.name: RNAi_Gene
template.title: RNAi phenotype [C. elegans] --> Genes.
template.longDescription: Search for C. elegans genes with a particular RNAi phenotype.

template.name: RNAiPhenotype_GeneOrthologue_new
template.title: RNAi phenotype [C. elegans] --> Genes + Orthologues.
template.longDescription: Search for C. elegans genes with a specific RNAi phenotype and show the orthologues of these genes. (Data Source: WormBase, InParanoid).

template.name: RNAIScreen_screenhits
template.title: RNAi Screen [D. melanogaster] --> RNAi Screen results.
template.longDescription: Give all results for a specific published RNAi screen from the DRSC. Result types can be: not screened, not a hit, weak, medium or strong hit. (Data Source: DRSC).

query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.symbol Gene.rnaiResults.amplicon.primaryIdentifier Gene.rnaiResults.result Gene.rnaiResults.rnaiScreen.publication.pubMedId Gene.rnaiResults.rnaiScreen.publication.firstAuthor Gene.rnaiResults.rnaiScreen.name Gene.rnaiResults.rnaiScreen.analysisDescription Gene.rnaiResults.rnaiScreen.cellLine Gene.rnaiResults.dataSets.dataSource.name

template.title: RNAi Screen + Result type [D. melanogaster] --> RNAi Screen results.
template.longDescription: For a specific published RNAi screen from the DRSC, find all genes that were found to be a certain result in that screen. Result types can be: not screened, not a hit, weak, medium or strong hit. (Data Source: DRSC).

template.name: SpecificStage_agLifecycleExpression
template.title: Microarray Time course data from Koutsos et al. (filter on specific stage) --> Genes [A. gambiae].
template.longDescription: Show gene expression data for a particular developmental stage according to the Koutsos et al data set. The templates Microarray Time course data from Koutsos et al (filter on general stage (and ratio)) --> Genes [A. gambiae], allow you to filter on more general stages. Note that the reference sample in this experiment is pooled RNA produced in vitro from ESTs that were used as substrates to produce amplicons for the spotted microarrays.

query.name: SpecificStage_agLifecycleExpression
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.microArrayResults.value Gene.microArrayResults.standardError Gene.microArrayResults.type Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample2 Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample1 Gene.microArrayResults.material.primaryIdentifier Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.name Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.publication.firstAuthor Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.publication.pubMedId

constraint.description: Show genes at stage:

template.name: SpecificStageRatio_agLifecycleExpression
template.title: Microarray Time course data from Koutsos et al. (filter on specific stage and ratio) --> Genes [A. gambiae].
template.longDescription: Show gene expression data for a particular developmental stage according to the Koutsos et al data set and filter this data on the mean signal ratio. The templates Microarray Time course data from Koutsos et al (filter on general stage (and ratio)) --> Genes [A. gambiae], allow you to filter on more general stages. Note that the reference sample in this experiment is pooled RNA produced in vitro from ESTs that were used as substrates to produce amplicons for the spotted microarrays.

query.name: SpecificStageRatio_agLifecycleExpression
query.view: Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.microArrayResults.value Gene.microArrayResults.standardError Gene.microArrayResults.type Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample2 Gene.microArrayResults.assays.sample1 Gene.microArrayResults.material.primaryIdentifier Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.name Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.publication.firstAuthor Gene.microArrayResults.assays.experiment.publication.pubMedId

constraint.description: Show genes at stage:
Which have a mean signal ratio of:

template.name: Stage_FlyFishBDGP
template.title: Stage [D. melanogaster] --> FlyFish + BDGP in situ data.
template.longDescription: For a given embryonic stage of Drosophila melanogaster, show which genes are expressed or not expressed according to the FlyFish and BDGP in situ projects.

template.name: stage_GenesBDGPandflyFishExpressed
template.title: Stage --> genes expressed according to both FlyFish and BDGP in-situ data.
template.longDescription: Show genes that are expressed at a particular embryonic stage according to both the FlyFish and the BDGP in-situ data. Note: the stages measured by each dataset vary slightly (e.g using stage 8 will return results for stage 7-8 for the BDGP in-situ data and 8-9 for the fly-FISH data).

query.name: stage_GenesBDGPandflyFishExpressed
query.constraintLogic: A and E and B and C and F and D

constraint.description: Show genes that are expressed at embryonic stage: (according to both the BDGP in-situ data and te Fly-FISH mRNA expression data.

template.longDescription: Show all 3-D protein structures that have been determined using a certain experimental method. Data available for D. melanogaster (Data Source: PDB).

template.name: TiffinBSmotif_expressionTerm
template.title: Tiffin motif --> Expression terms.
template.longDescription: Find all the expression terms associated with a particular Tiffin motif. Expression terms are from the ImaGO controlled vocabulary.

template.name: TiffinBSmotif_genes
template.title: Tiffin motif [D. melanogaster]--> Tiffin sites in upstream intergenic regions of genes.
template.longDescription: For a particular motif predicted by Tiffin, show all the actual predicted sites corresponding to this motif that occur within an upstream intergenic region of a gene. Show the actual location of each site. (Data Source: Tiffin).

template.name: TilingPathSpan_GeneLocation
template.title: Tiling path span --> Genes [D. melanogaster].
template.longDescription: For a particular tiling path span, search for any overlapping genes in D. melanogaster . Show chromosome coordinates of the genes.

template.name: TimeCourseDataGeneralStage_genes
template.title: Microarray Time course data from Arbeitman et al. (filter on general stage) --> Genes [D. melanogaster].
template.longDescription: Show gene expression data for a particular developmental stage according to the Arbeitman et al data set. This template allows you to query on the general stage: use LIKE *Embryo*; *Larvae*; *Metamorphosis*; *Adult female* or *Adult male*. The templates Microarray Time course data from Arbeitman et al (filter on specific stage (and ratio)) --> Genes [D. melanogaster], allow you to filter on more specific stages. Note that the reference sample in this experiment is pooled mRNA representing all stages of the life cycle.

query.name: TimeCourseDataGeneralStage_genes

constraint.description: show data for developmental stage:
